name: Wendler-5-3-1
body:
### Features.
* Breakdown Wendler lift numbers by week and lift
* Add and modify lifts
* Log and track your lifts through the 5/3/1 cycles

### Something missing?
If you think the app can be improved in any way, let me know! I want this to be the definitive 5/3/1 app. E-mail me at wendler531@stefankendall.com for any and all feedback.

![Screenshot 1](https://github.com/stefankendall/wendler531-website/raw/master/images/screenshots/individual-lift.png)
tagline: Follow Jim Wendler's 5/3/1 lifting program to increase strength and lifting ability. Get the app, and get lifting.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
